text: Budd Hill is a mountain in Montgomery County in the U.S. State of New York by the border of Schoharie County. It is located north-northeast of the Village of Sharon Springs and south of the Village of Ames. Maple Hill is located north-northeast and Corbin Hill is located east-southeast of Budd Hill. ==References== Category:Mountains of Montgomery County, New York Category:Mountains of New York (state)
title: Budd Hill (Montgomery County, New York)
